(Post damage CODE)

Oblitertron/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Serpentor/Unitron:




The Oblitercons leaped into the air, forming the 45 foot tall Oblitertron.

"I WILL OBLITERATE ALL!!!" he yelled, firing off 10 rapid optic blasts at the 
Mafia Base.

---

Demon Wulf fired off the blade missile at the Mafia Base.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off three bolts from his rifle at the base.

---

Dark Claw formed a large explosive orb, throwing it at the Mafia Base.

---

Unitron dived, firing off two missiles at the Mafia Base.
